Name: Elefsina
Description: The capital of West Attica, known for its rich archaeological history and the Eleusinian Mysteries.

Name: Aspropyrgos
Description: An industrial town with a prominent role in manufacturing and its proximity to major transportation routes.

Name: Mandra-Eidyllia
Description: A municipality with a mix of industrial zones, agricultural areas, and natural parks.

Name: Magoula
Description: A small town known for its industrial presence and rural surroundings.

Name: Kytarious
Description: A small town in the western part of Attica known for its natural parks and green landscapes.
